product_name: SIGMA SPORT ROX 10.0 GPS Bike Computer Set - Wireless
long_description: A cycling GPS you can use to navigate and track your route, the SIGMA SPORT ROX 10.0 wireless GPS bike computer set also measures your speed, heart rate and cadence to enhance training.
short_description: A cycling GPS you can use to navigate and track your route, the SIGMA SPORT ROX 10.0 wireless GPS bike computer set also measures your speed, heart rate and cadence to enhance training.
